SCTX:
Begin MuseumAurielShield


if ("Torasa Aram".aurielshield < 2)
	Disable
endif

if ("Torasa Aram".aurielshield == 2)
	Enable
endif

if (OnActivate == 1)
	set "Torasa Aram".aurielshield to 3
	Activate
	player->removeitem "ebony_shield_auriel_x" 1
	player->additem "ebony_shield_auriel" 1
endif


End MuseumAurielShield
